snippet: During Milan’s design week, the Italian madre of all things chic and a supporter of fledgling designers, discusses her “Untold” show, in which modern pieces complement their 19th-century surroundings.
abstract: During Milan’s design week, the Italian madre of all things chic and a supporter of fledgling designers, discusses her “Untold” show, in which modern pieces complement their 19th-century surroundings.

headline.main: Rossana Orlandi, the Queen of Design, on Her Salone Exhibition
